disp-quote.p: 1) Overall, the reviewers felt that this paper was quite a bit more complicated in the presentation of its results than it needs to be, and I encourage the authors to find ways of simplifying the Results section and linearizing the framing of the key messages. I wondered what the benefits of presenting both the well-mixed and spatial models were? Which is the most appropriate? Do they say importantly different things? Could the manuscript be simplified by focusing on just one?
